@FeeGM8 @JamTarts @jamb0skickback I have worked with families and children with autism in the past so I understand exactly what you’re after. Speak to Keith Ferguson who is the man who can ask the question. KeithFerguson@homplc.co.uk is his direct email address. 👌
It wasn’t to be tonight for the Hearts Colts. Nice to have a decent crowd backing the young lads. Thanks everyone! ⚽️ https://t.co/oxqoS0gdV2

I’m on the tannoy and tunes, Gary Locke on Hearts TV, it’s a bit different from our day jobs. It’s @JamTarts Colts vs @RCFCStaggies in the @irnbrufootball Cup. Nice to see a decent crowd at Tynecastle Park. Before you ask, they’re behind me! 😂⚽️ https://t.co/BE9lSbRrb4
@cjsandison It’s their new theme tune for this Irn Bru Cup run!😂😂😂
RT @cjsandison: @immarkmartin producing the tunes tonight. Candi Stanton, Young Hearts Run Free is an absolute jam🕺🏼
@GraemeDuthie2 @HeartsMcCrae @indoorscots @edinburghpaper @TheScotsman @edfringe @heraldscotland @notsobigbryan @ShaunYouCrazy @theskinnymag @ionmagazine Here, here to that!

@SIAinslie @iain_mac @HeartsMcCrae @indoorscots @edinburghpaper @TheScotsman @edfringe @heraldscotland @notsobigbryan @ShaunYouCrazy @theskinnymag @ionmagazine It mentions them all, Dunfermline etc. Focusses primarily on the Hearts guys but others are mentioned.
@ChrisCanning24 @HeartsMcCrae @indoorscots @edinburghpaper @TheScotsman @edfringe @heraldscotland @notsobigbryan @ShaunYouCrazy @theskinnymag @ionmagazine He’s unbelievable in it! What a show!

@keithl050 @HeartsMcCrae @indoorscots @edinburghpaper @TheScotsman @edfringe @heraldscotland @notsobigbryan @ShaunYouCrazy @theskinnymag @ionmagazine £24 at the box office, £20 for season ticket holders. Well worth every penny, it's a heck of a journey in 90 minutes!
@BekkiHarley9513 See you tonight! HHGH! x
@BekkiHarley9513 Ticket office is open now up until kick off.⚽️👍
@BekkiHarley9513 Hey Becky, it's a 7.30pm kick off tonight. ⚽️

I've just been lucky enough to see @HeartsMcCrae and wow, just wow! You will struggle to find a more powerful piece of theatre playing at #edfringe . Funny, tearful, scary and moving, the whole company are a credit to the story. This is MUST see! #EdinburghFringe2018 #reviews https://t.co/WxJAmibAIY
RT @jamesshields51: Go on....Do what I did and join the team! https://t.co/RmTKe7dYCc
Fancy joining us at @JamTarts ?⚽️😍 https://t.co/H0bsfn1H1a
This video will brighten up a dull Tuesday morning! We all need to be a bit like this guy! #PositivityCorner #TuesdayMotivation #tekkers 😂👌🔥👏 https://t.co/UKtK6zX2oJ
@karennewton2014 @HeartsMcCrae @JamTarts I’m really buzzing for it. The cast are so nice around the ground and I’ve heard really draw emotion from the audience.

Really stoked to be taking my gran to see @HeartsMcCrae tomorrow at @JamTarts 👌 She’s doing lots of research on the McCrae’s Battalion and the First World War so its like a kid the night before Christmas situation. Can’t wait to see the production in full. #edfringe 👌

If you're at a loose end tomorrow, come and watch our @JamTarts Colts against @RCFCStaggies for just £2 and £5. I'll be on the tunes and tannoy as our young lads go for @irnbrufootball cup glory! You can't beat a night under the lights at Tynecastle Park https://t.co/7oSF5ZlgsD https://t.co/DDkS9l4ukP

Snapped this scene during one of the @HeartsMcCrae performances earlier at an unbelievably moving part. I only saw a few minutes and was really emotional. No spoilers but the play really is thee hidden gem at #edfringe2018 👌 The cast put in some really #powerfulperformances 👏 https://t.co/HpnyR29JeC

Good luck to everyone getting their #examresults today. Remember, if you haven’t got what you wanted there are plenty of other options. I went to college for a year and did not too badly from that. Chin up if you need to go again and congratulations if you’ve done well! 👌😃😢👏 https://t.co/5FiBflmkoP

@therealpud77 @Helzibob79 @HeartsMcCrae Go and see it. I’ve been lucky enough to talk to some of the talented company this week. There’s been emotion from the audience, definitely worth a watch. ❤️
@therealpud77 @Helzibob79 @HeartsMcCrae It’s a story that is beautifully told. It doesn’t matter who you support, the story is important thing to see. ❤️

I’ve just caught up with @WOSWrestling on ITV Player and it’s absolutely addictive! Some of the acting wouldn’t be out of place in Eastenders but you can’t deny it’s entertaining! Chuckling away @gradowrestling and his opponents! Good stuff! 😂😂😂 #WOSWrestling https://t.co/ORAcYst7cQ
